overview: Anna is annoyed that Melina pulls her quilt while they sleep. Melina is annoyed that Anna smokes. Anna is bothered by the music that Melina listens to. Melina gets annoyed when Anna does not wash the dishes. They both feel that the other spends a lot of time on her cell phone. Anna gets angry with Melina's mess. Melina can not bear to sleep with the light on, as Anna prefers. Two women putting their complaints "under the rug" one after the other…

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: Dessous
